name: Cyberdrome
description: Fight through the battles like a ninja god in a first-person, cyberpunk-style and melee-heavy arcade arena world.
minimum_requirements: OS: 10.0.7.17134 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4710MQ @ 2.50GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 860 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10.0.7.17134 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space
